definition: an unskillful painting, cover (a surface) by smearing (a substance) over it
details:
noun
- an unskillful painting
- a blemish made by dirt
= synonyms: blot
- material used to daub walls
verb
- cover (a surface) by smearing (a substance) over it
= synonyms: smear
- apply to a surface
= example: apply to a surface
= synonyms: put on
- coat with plaster
= example: coat with plaster
= synonyms: plaster
